questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image of the equipment.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment.
prepare the Incident / Damage and Missing Report.
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230.

videos.src: assets/videos/ASPEN SP1PLUS/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALL OUTLET VOLTAGE.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALL OUTLET VOLTAGE

questions.question: shift the equipment to another place where the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230
check the continuity of power cord and confirm whether the power cord is defective.

videos.src: assets/videos/ASPEN SP1PLUS/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE POWER CORD CONTINUITY.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE POWER CORD CONTINUITY

questions.question: replace the power cord with a new one
open the equipment as shown in the video, check the continuity of fuses and confirm whether the fuses are blown

videos.videoName: Video for checking continuity of fuse

questions.question: replace the fuses with a new one
check and confirm whether the output voltage of 13 VDC available.
repair or replace the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether the ml of syringe is detected.
replace the sensor with a new one
check and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON but the display is blank.
check and confirm whether there is any loose connection or breakage of cable from display to control board.
reseat or replace the cable accordingly
repair / replace the display accordingly
set the flow rate and confirm whether there is no / no free movement of piston at all.
open the equipment as shown in the video, check for any obstruction / dust in the piston path.
clean the dust and
check and confirm whether there is any damage / dust in the gears.
repair or replace the sensor & motor drive board accordingly
check and confirm whether some of the buttons or all the buttons do not respond while pressing.
check and confirm whether there is any loose connection or breakage of cable from switch control board to control board.
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
repair / replace the switch control board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing switch control board

questions.question: If the problem is not yet solved, contact the technical team for any other assistance through video call.
Thanks
